scripts.test:e2e:webpack: cross-env APP_PORT=9006 concurrently "npm run dev:webpack" "playwright test --grep-invert prod-build" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env APP_PORT=9006 concurrently "npm run dev" "playwright test --grep-invert prod-build" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:e2e:prod:webpack: npm run build:prod:webpack && cross-env PROD_PORT=9007 concurrently "npm run serve:prod" "playwright test src/router.prod-build.spec.ts" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:e2e:prod:vite: npm run build:prod:vite && cross-env PROD_PORT=9008 concurrently "cross-env PROD_PORT=9008 node static-server.js" "cross-env PROD_PORT=9008 playwright test src/router.prod-build.spec.ts" --kill-others --success first
scripts.test:e2e:watch: cross-env APP_PORT=9006 concurrently "npm run dev" "playwright-watch test"
scripts.test:e2e:debugger: cross-env APP_PORT=9006 PWDEBUG=1 concurrently "npm run dev" "playwright test --debug"
